subSubSection.paragraph: This taxon is identical to Pseudorasbora pumila pumila of Hosoya (2013) , in light of a potential new subspecies of Pseudorasbora pumila being recognized from Nagano, Shizuoka, Aichi, and Gifu Prefectures ( Hosoya 2002 , Hosoya 2013 ). This taxon was only recorded in irrigation ponds rich in aquatic plants.
